phrases: My plan is already finished.
What?!
Okuyasu's big bro was a pretty great danger.
Koichi, let us get the heck out of this house.
Huh?
Wh-What about the bow and arrow that sh-shot me?
The bow and arrow?
Looks like Okuyasu's big bro hid them somewhere.
Are we going to look for them?
Y-Yeah...
You know, I could swear they mentioned having a dad around.
I took some pretty major damage, so let us just leave for today.
W-We cannot!
I-I am alive because you healed my wounds for me, but...
If someone else is shot with that bow and arrow again,
they might actually die!
Here in this town!
S-Stay here.
I-I will go look for them myself!
N-Not to mention, I do not think their dad is here right now.
I-If he was, I am s-sure he would have shown himself by now.
He is a lot braver than he looks.
He can be tough when it counts...
Or maybe just reckless.
But right now, we should really hurry up and get out of this house.
Hey...
Wh-What?
D-Do not try to stop me.
I will not.
Let us hurry up, snap that bow and arrow in half,
and get the hell outta here together,
Koichi.
Jojo's Bizarre Adventure
Diamond is Unbreakable
Episode 5 The Nijimura Brothers, Part 3
They have an attic.
Maybe the bow and arrow are up here.
Th-There they are!
The bow and arrow!
They are hanging on the far wall!
Hey, I think this was a bad idea.
There is something in there.
Is something chained up in there?
I-Is it a dog?
Those sounds cannot be from a human...
I-It sounds like an animal.
No, I am scared!
What should we do?!
What should we do?
It was you who insisted on going!
Yeah, but...
We are just going to have to do this.
Listen up, Koichi.
You are going to kick in the door as hard as you can on the count of three.
We are going to scare it.
Then, I am going to run over and snap the bow and arrow in half.
Got it?
Yeah.
Here we go.
One...
Two...
Three!
Grab
What the hell is that?!
Koichi!
Help!
That hand does not belong to a Stand.
It is real!
That is a real body!
H-Help me!
Bleh...
I did not mean to chop it off...
Wh-What the heck is that creature?
I cannot believe that thing's been living near my house...
Bleh...
Looks like you finally saw the thing you were not supposed to see.
You bastard...
That thing right there... is our dad.
My dad needs these.
Th-The bow and arrow...
I want to find a Stand user for my dad's sake.
That is why I cannot let anyone else
have this bow and arrow or destroy them,
no matter what!
Is it some kind of disease?
Disease?
No.
My dad's perfectly healthy,
and he is got an appetite.
But he just keeps moaning, and he does not recognize me as his son.
So you were looking for a Stand user to fix your dad.
Fix?
You going to fix him for me?
That is not it, either.
It is the opposite.
I am looking for a Stand user who will kill my dad.
Dad will not die, no matter what.
Whether you smash his head in,
or grind up his body, or rip things off, nothing works!
I just want to let him die normally.
I swore when I was a kid that I would do anything to make that happen.
And to do that, I need this bow and arrow.
Otherwise, my dad will probably live like this forever.
Because my dad had some guy named Dio's cells
implanted in his head, so he ended up like this!
Dio?
Did you just say Dio?
That is the guy Jotaro talked about.
Let me tell you a bit about the past,
Josuke Higashikata.
After all, you are not completely uninvolved.
Everything happened eleven years ago, in 1988.
At the time, I was seven, and Okuyasu was four.
We lived in Tokyo.
The world was carefree, thanks to the bubble economy,
but at the time, my dad had no luck.
Our mom died of an illness,
the business that my dad was running went under,
Luxury Houses Nijimura Land
and he was in massive debt.
He would hit us for no reason all the time.
Our dad was a total loser.
But then, suddenly,
money started rolling in to my dad.
Even jewels and precious metals, too, sometimes.
He was not even really working.
I found out later when I did some research
that my dad had apparently already sold his soul to Dio.
He became one of his minions in exchange for money.
It seems that Dio was looking for anyone with Stand potential back then.
Somehow, he found out that my dad had the potential,
though I have no idea now what his Stand was like.
But one day...
Even though it was ten years ago, I still remember it vividly.
When I got home from school, around 2:00 PM...
Okuyasu!
Did Dad hit you again?
That scum!
N-No!
Huh?
Dio...
Dio's dead...
That has to be why!
Dad?
Dad, let us call an ambulance.
It is no use!
This is not an illness!
The flesh bud has gone berserk!
I am done for!
Dad!
About a year after that, he became a glob of flesh that cannot even tell
that we are his sons anymore.
Dio would implant his own cells into the heads of those he could not trust,
and order them around when he wanted to control them.
Dad had one of those flesh buds implanted in his head.
I spent ten years researching everything.
About Stands, about Jotaro...
Then I found out about the old woman named Enyaba,
and obtained the bow and arrow.
But as I learned all of this,
I also had to accept that my dad would never recover.
Because Dio's immortal cells had become one with him.
This is all he does, all day long.
Every single day...
Day after day, for ten years,
he uselessly scratches around that box of junk.
If I take the box away from him, he just cries for days.
It pisses me off.
Watching him just makes me hate the idea of living.
How many times have I told you not to make a mess?
He can be obedient if I discipline him,
but he never stops digging around in that box!
Bleh...
Hey!
You are the one who needs to stop!
He is your dad!
Yeah, that is right.
He is my father by blood.
But right now, he is as much my father as he is not.
He is a man who sold his soul to Dio, and got what he deserved.
Yet, on the other hand,
do you know how it feels, not being able to finish him off because he is your dad?
That is exactly why I want him to die normally.
Once he is finally dead, my life can actually begin!
Damn it!
I told you to stop that!
It pisses me off!
Hey!
That is enough!
I cannot let you have this bow and arrow.
No matter what!
Do not get the wrong idea!
I will worry about the bow and arrow later.
Right now, that box has my attention!
Dogyaa
Do
Th-The box?
gyaa
I saw him grabbing at some paper scraps,
so I was curious about what it was.
I see now.
A family photo...
S-So there was a reason.
There was a reason for the behavior he repeated for ten years.
He was looking for the photo of his sons at the time.
He might not understand what is going on right now,
but deep down inside, he still has his memories!
Memories of the past!
The
The Ha
The Han
The Hand
Oku
Okuyasu
Okuyasu Niji
Okuyasu Nijimura
Instead of looking for a Stand to kill him,
if you will try to find one that can cure him,
I do not mind helping you out.
But hand over that bow and arrow.
I am going to snap them in half.
You planning to run?
Big Bro, let us stop this.
Okuyasu!
Come on, let us stop all of this, okay?
You were still here?
Dad might get cured, right?
Even if his body does not go back to normal,
maybe his mind and his memories will go back to how he used to be.
Right?
Okuyasu!
What do you think you are holding?
Big Bro...
Out of the way, Okuyasu!
I cannot turn back anymore, no matter what happens!
I have already killed so many people in this city with this bow and arrow!
Besides, I do not even think of you as my little brother anymore.
Since you are not my little brother, I can kill you without hesitation!
B-Big Bro...
You guys...
Do you have any relatives here besides your dad?
Relatives?
There is only the three of us.
Th-That is...
It came out of the electrical outlet...
Okuyasu!
Stop spacing out, you dumbass!
Big Bro!
I am taking this bow and arrow, Keicho Nijimura!
I, who got shot by this bow and arrow, and had my Stand ability awakened!
You think...
someone like you can handle this bow and arrow?
Keicho Nijimura!
You said Stands depend on one's mentality, did not you?
Well, I have grown!
How else do you think my Stand, Chili Pepper, grew this much?
Worse Company!
Shut up!
Th-That is...
Electricity!
Okuyasu's big brother is being turned into electricity,
along with the bow and arrow!
Big Bro!
Do not touch me!
You will be dragged in, too!
Big Bro...
D-Damn it!
It is taking the bow and arrow!
Okuyasu...
You were always holding me back!
Big Bro!
Josuke!
I could have sworn I just saw someone who looked like
the user looking in through that window.
Do you know anything about that Stand we just saw, Okuyasu?
N-No.
My big bro found a lot of Stand users I did not know about.
J-Josuke!
Th-That is...
Okuyasu...
My big bro... deserved to end up like that.
There is no way he could have lived a decent life.
That was his fate.
But you know...
In the end, my big bro...
In the very end, my big bro defended me, did not he?
Josuke, you saw it, right?
Yeah.
I definitely saw it.
Your big bro defended you.
Is this Jotaro Kujo?
I do not recognize your voice.
Who are you?
That does not matter.
Jotaro Kujo, I am asking you to leave Morioh City.
I do not think I will listen to someone
I do not know suddenly telling me to leave.
Would you leave, no questions asked, if you were in my shoes?
I am the one who has the bow and arrow.
I got it after I killed Keicho Nijimura.
I do not mind killing you either, Jotaro, but I hear that
you have the ability to stop time for a second or two.
You sound like a tough opponent,
so I thought I would give you a call and warn you first.
Are you also Stand user?
What do you plan to do with the bow and arrow?
I do not plan on giving you any trouble.
And as long as Josuke Higashikata does not try anything,
Unavailable Number Public Phone
I will not do anything to him, either.
I just received this Stand ability.
I just want to have a little fun.
I am fed up with my annoying life of entrance exams and getting a job.
Are you a student?
What difference does that make?!
I am going to kill you and Josuke, too!
Got it?!
How many other Stand users are in this city?
Good grief...
Keicho Nijimura was buried in Kunimi Peak Cemetery,
which is west of Morioh City.
The stolen bow and arrow remain missing.
Nijimura Family
Okuyasu Nijimura decided to settle down
with his father in Morioh City for a while.
And...
Josuke, would you get that?
Yes?
Hey, Josuke!
Let us go to school.
Huh?
I will be going to the same school as you starting today.
Even so, you do not have to come and get me.
We are not in grade school.
Man, I had no idea your house was, like, right in front of mine!
Yeah, you could call that a shocking truth...
Come on.
Let us hurry up and go.
Oh, is that a friend of yours, Josuke?
Hi!
I am Okuyasu Nijimura!
Come on in and have a cup of coffee while he finishes getting ready.
Really?
Thank you very much!
Your mom is totally hot.
Pardon the intrusion!
This is just great... and heavy...
Episode 6 Koichi Hirose (Reverb)
Episode 6 Ko ichi Hirose (Reverb)
